Warnings
  • Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Figure/Properties/id: unknown concept "tree"
  • Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Figure/Properties/id: unknown concept "graph"
Name Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Figure/Properties/id

Function
  1. FProperty id(str name)
  2. FProperty id(computedStr cname)
Description Assign the identity name to the current figure. Identities are used in compositions like graph, tree and treemap to define the edges between figures. The name may also be computed by a callback cname.
